title: Oh...Sir! The Hollywood Roast
notes: Game hangs upon closing and leaves a dump file. Otherwise perfectly playable.
Runs, but crashes too frequently to be playable.  Maybe sound-related?
title: Oh...Sir! The Hollywood Roast

notes: Crashes with music still running, error message "the game has crashed". error.log says: KERNEL32.dll caused an Unknown exception type (0x80000100) in module KERNEL32.dll at 0023:7b43c45c
title: Oh...Sir! The Hollywood Roast

notes: PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 makes the game run great. It still crashes on exit, requiring manual termination of the game, but otherwise no issues found. Played several hours of campaign over several sessions.
title: Oh...Sir! The Hollywood Roast
